description: Visualizing audio as a mesh based on frequencies with Three.js and SoundCloud API.
Real-time simulation of cloth using a mass and spring based system.
Physically-based renderer based on 3D COLLADA models and a pathtracing algorithm.
Automatic image mosaicing with the Multi-Scale Oriented Patches (MOPS) algorithm.
LSTM classifier that reliably identifies music genres based on audio spectrograms.
